## R Markdown


```{r message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
df <- data.frame(
        lng = c(113.34023, 113.3475),
        lat = c(23.14333, 23.14371),
        lab = c("office","home")
)
m <- leaflet(df,options = leafletOptions(minZoom = 0, maxZoom = 18)) %>%
        setView(lng=mean(df$lng), lat=mean(df$lat), zoom = 12) %>%
        addTiles() %>%
        addCircles(~lng, ~lat) %>%
        addAwesomeMarkers(~lng, ~lat,label=~lab) %>%
        print()

```
